verses.text: Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. D'a val smasanil in k'ool ol val wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
Yacb'an pitzan into ol val wach' lolonel t'ay. Yacb'an ayinto eq'ui, ol in b'itan t'a in Diosal.
Manh eyak'och anima niwan yelk'och yipoc e k'ool, yujto animanhej eb', yuj chi' max yal-laj scolvaj eb'.
Ayic scham eb', tz'ochcan eb' pococal. Ha t'a jun k'u chi' slajvicanel tastac sna eb' sk'ulej.
Te wach' yic mach schaan scolval sDiosal vinhaj Jacob. Anhej Jehová Dios chi' ayoch yipoc sk'ool.
Ha Jehová b'oannac satcha’anh, lum lum, ha' mar yet' masanil tastac ay t'a junjun makan chi'. Tz'elnhejk'och tas syala'.
A' sb'oan yaj b'aj tz'ixtaj eb' anima, syak'anpax svael eb' ay svejel. A' scolanel eb' ayoch t'a preso.
Ha Jehová sjacan sat eb' max ujilaj yilani, squetzan q'ue vaan eb' stelvi. Xajan eb' anima wach' spensar yuj.
Ha Jehová scolan eb' anima ch'oc chonhab'il. Anhejton pax ha' tz'ilan eb' unin chamnac smam yet' eb' ix ix chamnac yetb'eyum. Palta tz'ak'ji somchaj eb' sk'ulan chukal yuj.
Ex aj Sion, a Jehová ol ak'an Yajalil t'a masanil tiempo. Ha co Diosal ol och Reyal t'a junelnhej. Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
